text: Jean Laborde (8 March 1922 â€“ 18 January 2022) was a French politician. Laborde was born in Bouzon-Gellenave, France. He took part in the French Resistance. In 1973, he was elected to the National Assembly. In 1977, he was elected Mayor of Auch. He retired from politics in 1995. Laborde died in Auch, France on 18 January 2022 at the age of 99. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French mayors Category:People from Gers Category:Politicians from Occitanie
title: Jean Laborde (politician)
